assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Furubayashi Shiko Co.,Ltd. plans, designs, manufactures, and sells packaging products in Japan and internationally. The company offers gift boxes for gifts, special moisture-proof papers, paper tubes, carry cartons, cosmetic cardboard boxes, bag-in-cartons, system cartons, etc., as well as printing products for food, beverages, confectionery, chemicals, soaps, detergents, cosmetics, miscellaneous goods, electric appliances, and agricultural products. It also provides materials, such as cellophane, resin film, metal foil, liquid, solid, powder, etc.; and packaging materials, including bags, standing pouches, labels, etc. In addition, the company offers laminations comprising paperboards, papers, resin films, metal foils, and barrier coatings; molded containers, which include synthetic resin containers, synthetic resins, and paperboards; and commercial printed matter, such as flyers, catalogs, posters, POP, storefront displays, etc. Further, it provides filling, packaging, and multi-pack packaging machineries; labeling systems and labelers; vertical/horizontal cartoning and integrated packaging machines; and packaging streamlining and engineering services, as well as contract packaging services for confectionery, food, cosmetics, miscellaneous goods, etc. The company was founded in 1934 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
